entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
